posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 
“I'll take it” trumps any ongoing negotiations.


***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but please email to follow up.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=596864&d=1699808490[/IMG]
Howell, hand at hip, Sov.460 – 100

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=596865&d=1699808503[/IMG]
Schmidt, throwing, Sov.150 – 125

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=596866&d=1699808516[/IMG]
Wagner, left shoulder, OM – 125

*** Always open for trades. Especially T206 Hindu or T207 BL Series. *** 

Thanks, Scott
